channel.title: Iota on Salva Alcántara
channel.description: Recent content in Iota on Salva Alcántara

item.title: The IOTA song
item.description: Among the different cryptocurrencies out there, I feel very excited about what IOTA can bring to the table. Perhaps in the future I can find the time to write about it from a technical perspective and make a real contribution to its community. Today’s post is just to have some fun while the sleeping giant takes the world by storm. The genesis. One day my brother played a song from basshunter on his phone.
